mailInvalid: Please enter only valid email addresses

userCantFindRole: Cant find roles. Please contact the admin! Help: Ensure that the name is still the same and that the bot role is higher in the serversettings role menu then the verified and unverified role.
emailText:
🎉 Welcome to %VAR%!

📧 EMAIL VERIFICATION REQUIRED
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Thank you for joining our Discord community! To complete your verification and gain access to the server, please follow these simple steps:

🔹 STEP 1: Copy your verification code below
🔹 STEP 2: Open Discord and find the verification bot
🔹 STEP 3: Send ONLY this code to the verification bot (not to any other user)

🔐 YOUR VERIFICATION CODE:
%VAR%

⚠️  IMPORTANT SECURITY NOTICE:
• This code is unique to you and should never be shared
• Only send this code to the official verification bot
• If someone else asks for this code, DO NOT give it to them
• This code will expire for security purposes

❓ Need Help?
If you're having trouble, please contact a server moderator.

Welcome aboard! 🚀
